autoClearSearchValue.description: Whether to clear the search box after selecting an item, only valid if 'mode' is 'multiple' or 'tags'
autoClearSearchValue.description_zh: 是否在选中项后清空搜索框，只在 `mode` 为 `multiple` 或 `tags` 时有效

bordered.description: Whether there is a border or not

defaultActiveFirstOption.description: Whether to highlight the first option by default
defaultActiveFirstOption.description_zh: 是否默认高亮第一个选项

defaultOpen.description: Whether to expand the drop-down menu by default
defaultOpen.description_zh: 是否默认展开下拉菜单

:defaultValue.description: Specifies the items that are selected by default
:defaultValue.type: string / string[] / number / number[] / LabeledValue / LabeledValue[]

popupClassName.description: The className attribute of drop-down menu
popupClassName.description_zh: 下拉菜单的 className 属性

:popupMatchSelectWidth.description: The drop-down menu is the same width as the selector. 'min-width' is set by default and is ignored when the value is less than the width of the selection box. false turns off virtual scrolling
:popupMatchSelectWidth.description_zh: 下拉菜单和选择器同宽。默认将设置 `min-width`，当值小于选择框宽度时会被忽略。false 时会关闭虚拟滚动

:dropdownStyle.description: Style attribute of the drop-down menu
:dropdownStyle.description_zh: 下拉菜单的 style 属性

:fieldNames.description: Customize node label, value, options, and groupLabel fields
:fieldNames.description_zh: 自定义节点 label、value、options、groupLabel 的字段

:filterOption.description: Whether to filter based on inputs. When it's a function, it will receive 'inputValue' and 'option' parameters, and should return true when 'option' meets filter conditions, otherwise false
:filterOption.description_zh: 是否根据输入项进行筛选。当其为一个函数时，会接收 `inputValue` `option` 两个参数，当 `option` 符合筛选条件时，应返回 true，反之则返回 false

:filterSort.description: Sort function for filtering result items when searching, similar to compareFunction in Array.sort
:filterSort.type: (optionA: Option, optionB: Option, info: { searchValue: string }) => number
:filterSort.description_zh: 搜索时对筛选结果项的排序函数, 类似 Array.sort 里的 compareFunction

:getPopupContainer.description: Menu rendering parent node. Default renders to body. If you encounter menu scrolling positioning issues, try modifying it to a scrolling area and position relative to it
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 菜单渲染父节点。默认渲染到 body 上，如果你遇到菜单滚动定位问题，试试修改为滚动的区域，并相对其定位

labelInValue.description: Whether to wrap each option's label into value, changes Select's value type from 'string' to { value: string, label: ReactNode } format
labelInValue.description_zh: 是否把每个选项的 label 包装到 value 中，会把 Select 的 value 类型从 `string` 变为 { value: string, label: ReactNode } 的格式

:listHeight.description: Set the scroll height of the popup window

:maxCount.description: Specify maximum number of selectable items, only effective when 'mode' is 'multiple' or 'tags'
:maxCount.description_zh: 指定可选中的最多 items 数量，仅在 `mode` 为 `multiple` 或 `tags` 时生效

:maxTagCount.description: Maximum number of tags to display, responsive mode has performance impact
:maxTagCount.description_zh: 最多显示多少个 tag，响应式模式会对性能产生损耗

:maxTagPlaceholder.description: Content displayed when tags are hidden
:maxTagPlaceholder.description_zh: 隐藏 tag 时显示的内容

:maxTagTextLength.description: Maximum tag text length to display
:maxTagTextLength.description_zh: 最大显示的 tag 文本长度

:menuItemSelectedIcon.description: Custom icon for currently selected item when multi-selecting
:menuItemSelectedIcon.description_zh: 自定义多选时当前选中的条目图标

mode.description: Set Select's mode to multiple selection or tags
mode.description_zh: 设置 Select 的模式为多选或标签

:notFoundContent.description: Content displayed when dropdown list is empty
:notFoundContent.description_zh: 当下拉列表为空时显示的内容

optionFilterProp.description: Filter the corresponding 'option' property when searching. If set to 'children', it searches embedded content. If using the 'options' property to configure options, it's recommended to set optionFilterProp="label" for content search
optionFilterProp.description_zh: 搜索时过滤对应的 `option` 属性，如设置为 `children` 表示对内嵌内容进行搜索。若通过 `options` 属性配置选项内容，建议设置 `optionFilterProp="label"` 来对内容进行搜索

optionLabelProp.description: Property value of Option to fill back to selection box, default is Option's children. For example, when child elements need highlighting, this value can be set to 'value'
optionLabelProp.description_zh: 回填到选择框的 Option 的属性值，默认是 Option 的子元素。比如在子元素需要高亮效果时，此值可以设为 `value`

:options.description: Data-configured option content, provides better rendering performance than JSX definition
:options.description_zh: 数据化配置选项内容，相比 jsx 定义会获得更好的渲染性能

:removeIcon.description_zh: 自定义的多选框清除图标

showArrow.description: Whether to display the dropdown arrow

showSearch.default: Single select: false, Multiple select: true

:suffixIcon.description: Custom selection box suffix icon. To prevent icon from being used for other interactions, replaced icons by default won't respond to expand/collapse events; can pass through by adding 'pointer-events: none' style
:suffixIcon.description_zh: 自定义的选择框后缀图标。以防止图标被用于其他交互，替换的图标默认不会响应展开、收缩事件，可以通过添加 `pointer-events: none` 样式透传

:tagRender.description: Custom tag content render, only effective when 'mode' is 'multiple' or 'tags'
:tagRender.description_zh: 自定义 tag 内容 render，仅在 `mode` 为 `multiple` 或 `tags` 时生效

:labelRender.description: Custom render for currently selected label content (see LabelInValueType definition in documentation)
:labelRender.description_zh: 自定义当前选中的 label 内容 render

:tokenSeparators.description: Separators for automatic tokenization, only effective when 'mode="tags"'
:tokenSeparators.description_zh: 自动分词的分隔符，仅在 `mode="tags"` 时生效

:value.description: Specifies currently selected items, array for multiple selection (Select won't update when value array reference is unchanged)
:value.type: string / string[] / number / number[] / LabeledValue / LabeledValue[]
:value.description_zh: 指定当前选中的条目，多选时为一个数组。（value 数组引用未变化时，Select 不会更新）

virtual.description: Set false to disable virtual scrolling
virtual.description_zh: 设置 false 时关闭虚拟滚动

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

events.name: onChange
events.description: Called when option is selected or input value changes
events.description_zh: 选中 option，或 input 的 value 变化时，调用此函数

events.name: onDeselect
events.description: Called when unselected, parameter is the value (or key) of selected item, only effective in 'multiple' or 'tags' mode
events.description_zh: 取消选中时调用，参数为选中项的 value (或 key) 值，仅在 `multiple` 或 `tags` 模式下生效

events.name: onInputKeyDown
events.description: Callback when key is pressed down

events.name: onPopupScroll
events.description_zh: 下拉列表滚动时的回调

events.name: onSearch
events.description: Callback when text box value changes

events.name: onSelect
events.description: Called when selected, parameter is the value (or key) of selected item
events.params: function(value: string | number | LabeledValue, option: Option)
events.description_zh: 被选中时调用，参数为选中项的 value (或 key) 值

Option.name: title
Option.description_zh: 选项上的原生 title 提示

Option.name: value
Option.description: Default filtered by this property value
Option.description_zh: 默认根据此属性值进行筛选

OptGroup.name: title
OptGroup.description_zh: 选项上的原生 title 提示
